dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5770 IH: Water Data Improvement Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Neguse (for himself and Mr. Ciscomani) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To reauthorize certain United States Geological Survey water data enhancement programs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Water Data Improvement Act.

section.header: Water data enhancement by United States Geological Survey
section.text: Section 9507 of the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 (42 U.S.C. 10367) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking 2023 and inserting 2028; and
in subparagraph (B), by striking 2019 and inserting 2028;

paragraph.text: in subsection (b)(7), by striking 2023 and inserting 2028; and
in subsection (d)(4), by striking 2019 and inserting 2028.
